description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Chicken With Coconut & Lime Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken wings,Roast,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Jul 2020,Rice,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sticky Chicken With Coconut & Lime Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli and 2 lime cheeks to serve (and 2 lime cheeks to serve)
0.5 bunch coriander (plus extra coriander leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Place kecap manis, sriracha, garlic, ginger and zest and lime juice in a large bowl. Add chicken, tossing to combine. Set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.
Transfer chicken and marinade to roasting pan and bake for 40 minutes, basting chicken in pan juices every 10 minutes or until glaze has darkened and is sticky.

Meanwhile, to make the coconut & lime rice, place rice, coconut milk, 1 1/4 cups water, zest and lime juice in a large saucepan and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, for 20 minutes. Remove pan from heat, stand for 5 minutes, then fluff rice with a fork and fold through chopped coriander.
Divide rice among plates, top with chicken, then scatter over onion, coconut, chilli and extra coriander leaves. Serve with lime cheeks.
